title.rendered: NEWTECONS KICK OFF “5 STAR RESORT APARTMENT” ASIANA DA NANG PROJECT

content.rendered:
[Da Nang, April 27 , 2021] The groundbreaking ceremony of Asiana Danang project solemnly held at the project site, Lot 1A, Nguyen Tat Thanh Street, Hoa Hiep Nam Ward, Lien Chieu District, Da Nang city. Newtecons, as the General Contractor, cooperated with the Investor – Gotec Land Group to conduct and welcome representatives of local authorities and more than 200 participants.

Belong the chain of high-end resort apartment projects of Gotec Land Group – TOP 10 typical real estate investor in Vietnam , Asiana Danang is distinguished by its unique and luxurious architecture in the heart of the most “worthy” city for living in Vietnam”. The Groundbreaking Ceremony marks an important milestone in the Investor’s journey to create a symbolic work, a new step full of enthusiasm in the Da Nang.

Asiana Danang luxury apartment complex has the appearance of a 5* resort with 35 floors, 3 basements and 487 apartments for two blocks. The staggered layout creates architectural highlights and makes the most of the viewing angle so that 100% of the apartments have sea views, natural light, and efficiency in energy saving. Besides, the apartment is also smartly designed, integrating many different utilities in the complex: Infinity pool, private natural yoga floor, unique indoor and outdoor play area, beauty services, relaxing spa and attractive entertainment

Lying on the frontage of Nguyen Tat Thanh Street – which is considered the most beautiful street along beach in Vietnam, Asiana Danang project owns a wonderful view when capturing the whole view of the blue Da Nang Bay and the poetic Ba Na mountain, and the majestic Hai Van Pass.

Said by Mr. Florent Isnard – Design Director of Huni Vietnam Co., Ltd – Huni Architectes: “Asiana Danang is considered as one of the projects with the most unique and different design in the region. The design idea is formed from the image of a bamboo rampart, a special and close image to each person’s mind. Characteristic images such as bamboo joint, bamboo shoots, bamboo leaves… are incorporated into architectural elements gently but deeply in a contemporary direction. At the same time, the day and night lighting effects also highlight the concept of the building as well as the general landscape of the area”.

 

Representative of the operation management unit, Mr. David Jackson – CEO of Colliers Vietnam spoke at the ceremony: “Da Nang has been attracting a lot of resort and residential real estate investors because of its geographical location and favorable weather. As a management consulting unit, we hope that the combination in this project will bring luxurious experiences and satisfaction to investors when choosing Asiana Danang”.

Da Nang is known worldwide as one of the most beautiful beaches on the planet and one of the top resort options in Asia. In recent years, Da Nang has “transformed”, becoming the most modern and dynamic city in Vietnam.

Newtecons is proud to have contributed a part of our efforts to the development of Da Nang city since 2006 with a series of famous projects. Currently, accompanying Gotec Land Group to build the high-class Asiana Danang project, Newtecons is committed to investing in the most professional human resources and the most modern materials to implement the project on schedule with high quality, continue to make its mark on the map of Da Nang city with iconic works.

With the cooperateion between Newtecons and Gotec Land Group, Asiana Danang promises to be one of the most prestigious and classy projects in the region, a great place to relax and ejnoy life like a 5* resort, a perfect choice for domestic and foreign tourists.

According to Asiana Danang
